solution_line_template: She also loses ${weekly_earnings} * {insurance_rate} = $<<{weekly_earnings}*{insurance_rate}={insurance_deduction}>>{insurance_deduction} due to insurance.
Vikki also pays ${union_dues} in union dues.
In total Vikki loses ${tax_deduction} + ${insurance_deduction} + ${union_dues} = $<<{tax_deduction}+{insurance_deduction}+{union_dues}={total_deductions}>>{total_deductions} because of deductions.
Her final total pay after deductions is ${weekly_earnings} - ${total_deductions} = $<<{weekly_earnings}-{total_deductions}={answer}>>{answer}
